bucket Package¶

bucketModel Module¶

fla.gr bucket model

Basically what we have is a key value store in redis of all the session ID’s (store and retrieved via the cookie from Seshat)

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

models.bucket.bucketModel.adminBucketDict()¶

Attempts to make a single dict which holds the description and value for each bucket as the value, and the id of the bucket as the key. eg:

{“id0”: {“value”: True, “description”:”description goes here”, “name”: “enable id0”}}
Returns:A dict of ids and another dict. Each value is a smaller dict of the key value, name and description
